field.name: xml_s5_show_thumb
field.label: Do you want the post thumbnails visible?
field.description: Choose whether to show the "posted on" date. [NOTE: Thumbnails will only show for posts/pages that have one assigned through the "Edit Page/Post" screen]

field.name: xml_s5_breadcrumb_toggle
field.label: Do you want to show the "breadcrumb" for your site?

field.name: s5_hide_comments
field.label: Would you like to hide the comment area?
field.description: NOTE: This will hide but not disable commenting on your site (Use if you want to hide the "Comments Off" text).

field.name: xml_s5_seourl
field.label: Your Site URL if SEO enabled
field.description: If you turn on SEO URLs and your site loses its CSS formatting and flat out doesn't work enter your full site url here. Example: http://www.mysite.com

field.name: xml_s5_tooltips
field.label: Enable Tooltips?
field.description: Enable the tooltips feature for your site NOTE: it is highly recommened to disable if you are not planning to use

field.name: xml_s5_lytebox
field.label: Enable Lytebox?
field.description: Enable the lytebox feature for your images NOTE: it is highly recommened to disable if you are not planning to use

field.name: s5_widget_context_disable
field.label: Would you like to disable the S5 Widget Context Options?
field.description:
NOTE: Only do this if you are using the standalone Widget Context plugin
or if you want to see the same widgets on every page of your site.

field.name: s5_page_links_disable
field.label: Would you like to disable the S5 Page Links Tool?
field.description:
NOTE: Only do this if you are using the standalone "Page Links To" plugin
or if you have no need to point pages/posts at other targets.

field.name: s5_page_iinclude_disable
field.label: Would you like to disable the integrated "iinclude-page" plugin?
field.description:
NOTE: Only do this if you are using the standalone "iinclude page" plugin
or if you have no need to include page/post content in other pages/posts.

field.name: s5_page_exclude_disable
field.label: Would you like to disable the integrated "exclude-pages" plugin?
field.description:
NOTE: Only do this if you are using the standalone "exclude pages" plugin
or if you have no need to hide pages/posts from the page list and menus.

field.name: s5_accordion_disable
field.label: Would you like to disable the built in version of S5 Accordion Menu?

field.name: s5_disable_filters
field.label: Would you like to enable RAW HTML?
field.description:
NOTE: This will disable the built-in Wordpress
HTML filters that automatically insert HTML tags and tend to break site layouts.

field.name: demo_mode
field.label: Would you like to enable Demo Mode?
field.description:
(NOTE: this will enable users to temporarily change the way they see your site
by using URL arguments [such as "?menu=3"])
